text: The Mao Zedong Statue is a statue in Wuyi Square, Fuzhou, Fujian, China. It is tall. It depicts Mao Zedong holding out his arm. The statue was built by Yang Zhengrong, a painter in Fujian. It took a year and a half to build.http://www.66163.com/fujian_w/news/fzwb/991009/5_1.html ==References== Category:Chinese culture Category:Statues Category:1971 works Category:Fujian Category:1970s in art
title: Statue of Mao Zedong, Fuzhou
